page.title: 20ATTITUDES
page.content: In our survey we asked ,'Why do you like Tenterden and why did you move here?' Few moved because they had found work in Tenterden itself but liked it as a 'nice place to live'. All those questioned thought it a very friendly place and a caring community. The older people thought there were plenty of activities for them.Those involved with church activities were always busy.All thought it a pretty town with its tree-lined High Street, blend of old and new shops and the Kentish tile -hung houses. Most thought the surroundings rural and were pleased that the developments so far had left the centre unspoilt. Middle-aged and older people thought that the amenities were good but younger people and particularly teenagers disagreed.
